level.heading: Secured Transactions; Sales of Accounts and Chattel Paper.

level.text: REVISION OF ARTICLE 9 OF THE UCC

<D.C. Law 13-201 ยง 101 enacted the revision of the Uniform Commercial Code, Article 9, Secured Transactions, effective July 1, 2001, contained in Article 9 immediately preceding this appendix. For applicability of provisions of Article 9 in effect prior to July 1, 2001, see the transition provisions in ยง 28:9-701 et seq., of Article 9 ante.>
DC CODE D. V, T. 28, Art. 9, Refs & Annos
